channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Made for Each Other
channel.desc: A sculptor uses magic to mould her ideal man into reality, but trouble ensues when she begins to fall for her human friend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Groundswell
channel.desc: On the heels of a personal and professional setback, Chef Emma travels to Hawaii where she meets a handsome surf instructor whose lessons help her regain her footing.
